downloadTitle: FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint - Delivering Great Search Experiences with User Context
downloadDescription: This white paper describes best practices for applying user context with FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint.
detailsSection: This white paper is intended for all audiences that are required to know more about user context, its application in the enterprise, how to take advantage of FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint to deliver hyper-relevant results and best practice approaches for success.
systemRequirementsSection: • Requirements: To download and read a white paper, you must have Microsoft Word.
installInstructionSection: Click Download, and then save the file to your computer. Open the file in Word to read and print it.
